import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the linked CRM entities"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/crm/linked/entities"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of the CRM entities (contact, case, or opportunity) linked with a conversation.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"description":"Message ID. It may be ID of any message included in the conversation","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of entity information: {entity_id, entity_type, avatar_link, title}","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","title":"CrmContactData"}}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
